name: Silk Wrap Button Bracelet
description:
Comfortable, colourful, and totally original, these silk wrap bracelets are bound to attract compliments! As the browns, grey, and white of fall and winter near, remind yourself of the colours of summer with one (or more!) of these hand crafted bracelets. Made entirely by hand, the ribbons are sewn here in Peterborough by my lovely friend and I then dye the fabric in small batches resulting in variations between each ribbon. Adorned with my hand made glass disc bead "buttons", you can be sure that each bracelet is totally unique - just like you! Free of any metals, these bracelets are perfect for those with metal sensitivities. And these bracelets truly ARE "1 size fits all" as they are fully adjustable; just change where you tie the knot! (video demo on how to put them on is coming soon!). ** Please be advised that you will receive the same product shown in the photograph, but not the EXACT product shown. Bracelets measure approximately 48in long and wrap around your wrist. To customize the fit for your wrist, simply tie a loop at the end of the ribbon and slip it over the "button".**

SilkWrap Demo from Annie Scherz on Vimeo.

name: reLuma Silk Donut Necklace
description:
From bottles to beads, this necklace is recycling at its most beautiful form!

A recycled glass donut is strung delicately on an approximately 18in silk cord.

Actual beads vary depending upon the bottles in stock. Please contact me for more information.

** Please be advised that each piece is entirely hand made (by me!), therefore there are slight variations between each piece of jewellery and no one is identical to another. This adds to the charm and beauty of my jewellery - you are a one-of-a-kind, your jewellery should be too! You will receive the same product shown in the photograph, but not the EXACT product shown. **

Designed by Kerry Bogert (www.kabsconcepts.com)

name: SweetLoops Drop
description:
Sweet and simple, these handmade charms feature a glass accent on a sterling silver 1cm loop. Each one is COMPLETELY unique - definitely NOT factory made! Mix and match with Tiny Tags, Bitty Beads, or Luma Drop charms for a totally unique piece of jewellery. 

Contact me for more information!

name: Drop Charms
description:
Simple yet fun, these handmade mini pendants are 1cm round. Each one is COMPLETELY unique - definitely NOT factory made! Mix and match with Tiny Tags or Bitty Beads for a totally unique piece of jewellery. 

Contact me for more information!

name: Tiny Tag
description:
Sweet and simple, these hand stamped mini sterling silver tags measure 12mm. Can be stamped with a variety of images or letters and numbers. Mix and match with Bitty Beads or Luma Drop charms for a totally unique piece of jewellery. 

Contact me for more information!

name: Bitty Bead
description:
Subtle and classy, these handmade mini pendants measure 1-2.5cm. Each one is COMPLETELY unique - definitely NOT factory made! Mix and match with Tiny Tags or Luma Drop charms for a totally unique piece of jewellery. 

Contact me for more information!

name: A La Carte Necklace
description:
Mix and match to get exactly what you want! Add a Bitty Bead for a splash of colour, a hand stamped Tiny Tag to show a little love, and pick how many you want of each! Contact me for more information! 

Price reflects necklace shown (1 Bitty Bead, 1 Tiny Tag, 1 16-18.5in adjustable sterling silver chain).

name: reLuma Bauble Bracelet
description:
Made from found glass, such as bottles, this reLuma bracelet is chic and eco-conscious! These recycled glass beads are strung together to make an adjustable bracelet perfect to fit any wrist. Wear your jewellery with a clear conscious!

Bombay Blue - made from the bottle of Bombay Sapphire Gin.

Deep Sea Blue - when a bottle got knocked off the shelf of The Nuttshell Next Door Cafe in Lakefield, ON, the owner brought over the pieces over to the studio.

Emerald Green - a standard green wine bottle pulled out of the recycling box before the truck came to get it.

Pale Ice Green - a wine bottle dropped off by a friend. 

** Please be advised that each piece is entirely hand made (by me!), therefore there are slight variations between each piece of jewellery and no one is identical to another. This adds to the charm and beauty of my jewellery - you are a one-of-a-kind, your jewellery should be too! You will receive this EXACT bracelet shown. **

name: reLuma Earrings
description:
Made from found glass, such as bottles, these reLuma earrings are chic and eco-conscious! These recycled glass beads hang from 2.5 inch long, hand-forged sterling silver earring hooks. Wear your jewellery with a clear conscious!

Aqua: a friend donated an amazing turquoise bottle - this is extremely rare and when the glass is used up, I do not know if I will ever have more!

Bombay Blue - made from the bottle of Bombay Sapphire Gin.

Lavender - a friend brought over a broken martini glass that was this smoky lavender colour. There are VERY LIMITED amounts of this glass and when it is gone, it is GONE!

Deep Sea Blue - when a bottle got knocked off the shelf of The Nuttshell Next Door Cafe in Lakefield, ON, the owner brought over the pieces over to the studio.

Earring hooks are made from hand-forged sterling silver wire.

** Please be advised that each piece is entirely hand made (by me!), therefore there are slight variations between each piece of jewellery and no one is identical to another, even between earring pairs. This adds to the charm and beauty of my jewellery - you are a one-of-a-kind, your jewellery should be too! You will receive the same product shown in the photograph, but not the EXACT product shown. **
